name: Blight

metadata.Type: Spell, Chaos, Area, Totemable, Channel, Duration, DamageOverTime, DegenOnlySpellDamage, AreaSpell

gemDescription: Apply a debuff to enemies in front of you which deals chaos damage over time. Enemies who aren't already debuffed by Blight are also hindered for a shorter secondary duration, slowing their movement. Continued channelling adds layers of damage to the debuff, each with their own duration.
